entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries changing to a few rain showers and flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
